label: Feature-8
title: as a code reviewer I should have a way to easily add a comment to a line of code
description:
this should be done in a page in this current UI where I should have a + button next to the diff I'm reviewing and have the ability to create a 'child' issue to this change

this would be a new issue linked to the current file's issue which is linked to the task/bug issue

I should also have the ability to make it a 'question' , 'observation' , 'coding standard note', 'bug', 'security issue', etc...


related to this is the user story: "as a reviewer I should have an easy way to see and consume the answers to the comments/issues added during a code review (the ones created in the workflow described above")
